entry.title: Success
entry.content:
I'm very happy with my success with Statiq. Here's the site and I can even edit on the GitHub website, because I am using MarkDown.

I love it!
entry.summary: I'm very happy with my success with Statiq. Here's the site and I can even edit on the GitHub website, because I am using MarkDown.

entry.title: Welcome to my musings.
entry.content:
I'm excited about using Statiq. This is an awesome looking platform.

I have a couple of projects it will be good for.
entry.summary: I'm excited about using Statiq. This is an awesome looking platform.

entry.title: Nonsense
entry.content:
It is a sign of the apoclypse!

We’ve trained a model called ChatGPT which interacts in a conversational way. The dialogue format makes it possible for ChatGPT to answer followup questions, admit its mistakes, challenge incorrect premises, and reject inappropriate requests.

Nah!
entry.summary: It is a sign of the apoclypse!
